Client.Name: Neural Dynamics - Mouse Hybridization Chain Reaction

Project.Brief history of your project and organi:
Hybridization Chain Reaction
Fields: Molecular Biology/Neuroscience/Tissue Imaging, etc.
Introduction:
HCR is a molecular probe technology used for signal amplification, commonly used to detect RNA or DNA in in situ hybridization experiments.
The principle is that when the probe molecules detect the target molecule, they self-assemble through a chain reaction, generating an amplified signal, thereby greatly improving detection sensitivity.
It is widely used in large-scale data acquisition projects such as brain science, developmental biology, and tissue clearing imaging.

Project.How do you plan to prepare the dataset: We use the aws cli tool to download data from AWS, cut the data into appropriate sizes and package them into car files, and finally send them to SP via http/hard disk mail.
Project.In which geographies do you plan on maki: Asia other than Greater China, North America, South America, Europe
